text: Pellacalyx is a genus of trees in the family Rhizophoraceae. There are 7 or 8 species distributed in Southeast Asia and surrounding regions.Pellacalyx. Flora of China. Species include: * Pellacalyx saccardianus Scortech. * Pellacalyx yunnanensis Hu ==References== Category:Rhizophoraceae Category:Malpighiales genera Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Pellacalyx
